summary: This is an email chain forwarding a request from CBS News regarding Jeffrey Epstein. It appears to be internal correspondence, likely from the Bureau of Prisons (BOP) Public Affairs office, concerning media inquiries about Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the CBS News request mentioned in the email chain.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated August 11, 2019, concerning a CBS News request about Jeffrey Epstein.
The email originates from or is forwarded by the Bureau of Prisons (BOP) Public Affairs office (BOP-IPP/PublicAffairs@bop.gov).
The email's subject and timing suggest it relates to media inquiries following Epstein's death, which occurred on August 10, 2019.
